summary: This document is an invoice summary from J Epstein & Co Inc detailing various FedEx transportation charges incurred on multiple shipments. The invoice includes specific details about the charges, dates of service, and recipients involved in the transactions.

keyFacts: The invoice details multiple FedEx shipments made by J Epstein & Co Inc.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $1,932.74.
The invoice includes various recipients and senders, indicating a network of transactions.
Several packages were delivered to and from locations in New York and the Virgin Islands.
There are multiple mentions of fuel surcharges applied to the transportation charges.
